prompt:
Best time to book JFK→LGW within next 60 days.
Include: fare ranges (USD), typical booking window (days before departure),
peak/holiday effects, basic bag policy differences, and 1–2 concrete examples.
Return STRICT JSON: {
  "origin": string, "destination": string, "window_days": number,
  "best_window_days": [min,max], "fare_low_usd": number, "fare_high_usd": number,
  "notes": string
}

message.content:
{
  "origin": "JFK",
  "destination": "LGW",
  "window_days": 30,
  "best_window_days": [21, 45],
  "fare_low_usd": 400,
  "fare_high_usd": 800,
  "notes": "Booking 3-6 weeks in advance typically yields the best fares. Peak travel times, such as summer and holidays, can increase fares by 20-30%. Basic economy fares often include only a personal item, while standard fares may include a carry-on. For example, fares in late November (post-Thanksgiving) can be lower, while fares around Christmas can be significantly higher."
}
